short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlights and checks Salesforce profiles on the Field level Security page from a list of names.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension helps with the task of checking profiles "Visible" and "Read-Only" options in the "Set Field-Level Security" page of Salesforce.
Given a list of profile names, it checks the selected options for every profile in the list on every open tab of the current browser window.
It works only in Salesforce Classic. Lightning support will be added if requested.
